name: Power View Project File
summary: Learn about .RDLX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Power View visualizations can be exported to Microsoft PowerPoint for inclusion in presentations.

NOTE: Power View is a Microsoft SQL Server 2012 Reporting Services Add-in for Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010 Enterprise Edition. It uses Microsoft Silverlight technology for creating visualizations.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
